about.title: About Madhuban Traders
about.story_text: Madhuban Traders is a trusted supplier of high-quality, authentically sourced groceries and trading supplies. For over a decade, we've been committed to providing the finest cold-pressed oils and whole spices directly from farms to retailers and wholesalers across the region.
about.mission_text: We believe in transparency, quality, and sustainability. Every product we offer is carefully selected and processed to maintain its natural nutritional value and authentic flavor.
about.why_1: 100% Cold-Pressed: Our oils are extracted using traditional cold-pressing methods
about.why_2: Farm-to-Table: Direct relationships with local farmers
about.why_3: Bulk Availability: Flexible sizing from 500ml to 15L
about.why_4: Certified Quality: All products meet food safety standards
about.oils_text: Mustard Oil, Groundnut Oil in various sizes
about.spices_text: Turmeric, Cardamom, Cumin, Cinnamon, and more
about.journey_text: Madhuban Traders' journey began in 2024 with a vision to bring traditionally cold-pressed oils and natural spices to the world. Our founders' goal was simple — connect farmers directly to retailers and wholesalers, eliminate middlemen, and ensure the highest quality. Today, we proudly serve thousands of customers and have earned their trust through transparency and authenticity.
